class.name: NNSTTransition
class.brief_description: Transition between active states through [method NNSTNodes.send_event].
class.description: Provides [member event_name] and [member to] [NodePath] export variables to be consumed by [method NNSTNodes.send_event]. The transition is performed on the parent of this node.

members.member: Case sensitive event name that will trigger this [NNSTTransition].
